data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 48,449 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Nizhegorod.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nizhegorod, Russia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Nizhegorod, Russia to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Nizhegorod, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Nizhegorod, Russia to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Yukagir people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
There are 3,310,600 people living in the state of Nizhegorod. Only about 48,449 might be believers.
Father, show your mercy on the 3,262,151 people in Nizhegorod who are far from you. Please add 662 new house churches this year.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nizhegorod, Russia has a population of 3,310,600.

We estimate Nizhegorod has 48,449 people who might know Jesus, 1,858,180 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,403,971 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Nizhegorod, Russia, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

location.name: Nizhegorod
location.cities_list: Nizhniy Novgorod, Dzerzhinsk, Arzamas, Sarov, Kstovo
location.cities_list_w_pop: Nizhniy Novgorod (1,284,164), Dzerzhinsk (233,126), Arzamas (109,479), Sarov (88,000), Kstovo (67,242)
